alert.note: Alert for Isle of Wight; James City; Newport News; Surry (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued March 13 at 2:51AM EDT until March 13 at 7:00AM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level in low- lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Surry, James City, and Isle of Wight Counties...in addition to the city of Newport News. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Shallow flooding is possible in the most vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. JAMES RIVER AT SCOTLAND/JAMESTOWN VA MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 4.0 FT, MODERATE 4.5 FT, MAJOR 5.0 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.8 FT, MODERATE 2.3 FT, MAJOR 2.8 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 13/04 AM 4.0 1.8 1.9 1 MINOR 13/05 PM 3.4 1.2 1.8 1 NONE 14/06 AM 3.7 1.5 1.6 1 NONE 14/05 PM 1.9 -0.3 0.4 1 NONE 15/06 AM 1.7 -0.5 -0.4 1 NONE 15/06 PM 1.5 -0.7 0.0 1 NONE SEWELLS POINT VA MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 4.5 FT, MODERATE 5.5 FT, MAJOR 6.5 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.7 FT, MODERATE 2.7 FT, MAJOR 3.7 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 13/02 AM 4.3 1.5 1.7 2 NONE 13/02 PM 4.0 1.2 1.9 2 NONE 14/02 AM 4.1 1.3 1.5 3 NONE 14/03 PM 2.6 -0.2 0.6 3-4 NONE 15/04 AM 2.7 -0.1 0.1 3-4 NONE 15/04 PM 2.4 -0.4 0.4 3 NONE FORT MONROE VA MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 4.5 FT, MODERATE 5.5 FT, MAJOR 6.0 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.7 FT, MODERATE 2.7 FT, MAJOR 3.2 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 13/02 AM 4.3 1.5 1.6 2 NONE 13/02 PM 3.9 1.1 1.7 2 NONE 14/02 AM 4.0 1.2 1.4 3 NONE 14/03 PM 2.7 -0.1 0.6 3-4 NONE 15/04 AM 2.6 -0.2 0.0 3-4 NONE 15/04 PM 2.4 -0.4 0.4 3 NONE &&
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.
